definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Once soils are puddled badly, it may require several seasons to restore.
sentences.chinese: 一旦土壤板结粘闭，可能要几个季节才能得以恢复。

sentences.english: A combined optimization method is proposed to detect the plate structure with multiple damages.
sentences.chinese: 提出了应用于板结构多位置损伤诊断的组合优化方法。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a negative phototropism module and its pervasion plate structure.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种背光模块及所使用的扩散板结构。

sentences.english: It has the advantages of simple structure, easy operation and better distribution of gases.
sentences.chinese: 这种布风板结构简单，操作方便，气体分布均匀。

sentences.english: And disposal view in beam-plate structure is clarified.
sentences.chinese: 并简略地阐明梁板结构的布置意图。

sentences.english: The umbrella - shaped folded plate structure has been analyzed by finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 通过有限元方法对伞状折板结构进行了分析。

sentences.english: A compact soil has little insulating effect .
sentences.chinese: 板结的土壤几乎没有隔热作用。

sentences.english: A new semi-analytical solution for the analysis of vibration characteristics of smart plate structures is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 为智能板结构振动特性的分析提出了一种半解析法。

sentences.english: Folded-plate theory is an analytical method for box girder static analysis.
sentences.chinese: 折板理论是折板结构静力分析的精确方法。

sentences.english: The question of spear lag of beam plated construction is very complicated.
sentences.chinese: 梁板结构截面的剪力滞问题是一个比较复杂的问题。

sentences.english: Stir cylinder liner for the band structure, mixer body is long life.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌筒为带衬板结构，搅拌机架体使用寿命长。
